markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Homeward Swallow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2209)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 120 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small tattoo of a swallow always points toward your home. The tattooing must take place at a location you consider to be your home, or the magic fails to bind with the ink. When you travel to your home using teleportation that can be off target, such as [_teleport_](/Spells.aspx?ID=338) or [_plane shift_](/Spells.aspx?ID=222), you arrive exactly at your home. If your home is destroyed or you come to believe a new place is your home, this tattoo fades from your skin.

<document level="2" id="action-1706" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Homeward Swallow

text: <title level="1" right="Item 5" pfs="Standard" > Homeward Swallow Source Treasure Vault pg. 120 1.1 Price 150 gp Usage tattooed on the body --- This small tattoo of a swallow always points toward your home. The tattooing must take place at a location you consider to be your home, or the magic fails to bind with the ink. When you travel to your home using teleportation that can be off target, such as teleport or plane shift , you arrive exactly at your home. If your home is destroyed or you come to believe a new place is your home, this tattoo fades from your skin.
